backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor with functions to submit scores, retrieve high scores filtered by threshold (>=1000), and a play function that traps with a game over message.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: interactive gameplay mechanics, visual theme design, score tracking/persistence, and game asset rendering, with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend source files describing components for game rendering, controls, scoring, state management, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for game UI elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with 'Game Arena' title that loads the React application via main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps GamePage in a QueryClientProvider and applies background styling.
Canvas-based game renderer that preloads images, handles keyboard input, draws player/obstacles/collectibles, and displays game over overlay.
frontend/src/components/Game/GameControl: Game control buttons component providing Start, Pause, and Restart actions with conditional rendering based on game state.
Layout wrapper providing header with game branding, main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Game/ScoreDispla: Score display component showing current score and high score with trophy/star icons in styled containers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages backend actor instances based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameLogic.ts: Custom hook managing core game loop logic including player movement via keyboard, obstacle/collectible spawning and movement, collision detection, and game state transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useHighScore.ts: React hook that fetches high scores from the backend actor using React Query and provides a mutation to submit new scores with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a React Query hook to fetch high scores from the backend actor, enabled only when the actor is initialized and not fetching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, including game-specific color palette and Orbitron font import for display text.
frontend/src/lib/gameAssets.ts: Defines paths to game asset images (background, player sprite, element) and provides a preloadImages function to load them asynchronously.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Main game page component that orchestrates game logic, high score submission, and renders GameCanvas, GameControls, and ScoreDisplay components within GameLayout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH color system, game-specific colors, Orbitron font family, and animation keyframes for UI components.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, requirements, and image asset specifications for a game development project with score persistence and visual theming.
